clinical_history: Patient with bone pain and prior cancer history.
findings: Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in myocardium with SUVmax 13.3.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in myocardium, suggestive of malignancy.
Focal uptake in myocardium consistent with post-surgical changes.
Physiologic uptake observed in brain, myocardium, and urinary tract.
recommendations: Correlate with MRI/CT for precise anatomical localization.
